name: mtr-web
description: mtr-web is a WebSockets-based frontend for [mtr](http://www.bitwizard.nl/mtr/), built with [Flask](http://flask.pocoo.org/) (Python), [AngularJS](https://angularjs.org/), and [angular-websocket](https://github.com/gdi2290/angular-websocket), allowing you to ping/traceroute a network from a remote HTTP server. This is a useful diagnostic tool while making changes to your own network configuration.
